long_description: The Moving Comfort Cara bra supplies the style and comfort of your lingerie bra with the added support of a sports bra for everyday and workout wear. Molded cup construction combined with underwire provides support while the interior frame encases the breast to provide shaping and comfort. Seam-free, molded cups are smooth under clothing. Underwires are fully enclosed to prevent chafing. Wide positioning of the straps offers support, nonslip security and maximum shoulder comfort, and allows for a full range of arm movement. Front neckline stabilizes and helps control movement. Plush back and bottom elastic band add support, moisture management and comfort. Rear hook-and-eye closure with 3 adjustment positions provides a customized fit and allows easy on and off. Closeout.
short_description: The Moving Comfort Cara bra supplies the style and comfort of your lingerie bra with the added support of a sports bra for everyday and workout wear.
